title: The Cube
summary:
The sea view 1-bedroom house is located on a private, large and secluded area with its own private entrance
This house is a place of peace and serenity, enjoy the large terrace overlooking  the sea and koh samui either laying on sunbeds or you can relax in your own outdoor cargo net hammock.
There’s also an outdoor shower where you are alone in the nature
Follow a small path to enter the Cube House built integrating and respecting the nature and its huge rocks.

The space
The house is located on 4000 squares meters of nature, a huge sea view of  Samui,  Bantai pier.. beautiful trees, large rocks without any overlooked with a private entrance.

Guest access
The road is very easy to access at the house, less than a kilometer from the main road, close to shops..with private parking
location: Entire home in Ban Tai, Thailand

reviews.text: A great stay in the cube! In the house we had more than everything we need, including towels umbrellas and even boxing gloves. The view was amazing, and the place nicer than the photos. Josh was great, very helpful and provided us with everything we needed, including recommendations. having a motorcycle is important to stay here, but I would definitely say that about anywhere you stay in Koh Pa-Ngan. Fully recommend! לישראלים הבנו שם שזה ממוקם בערך 25-30 דקות מכל האקשן שלנו, אפשר באופנוע אם כן באלכם לסיים את הערב במקום שקט אבל אם באלכם להיות בעניינים זה בזן ביץ׳.

We had an absolutely wonderful 5-night stay in the heart of the jungle. Being surrounded by nature was a truly magical experience, rain or shine! Even during rainy days, the atmosphere remained peaceful and breathtakingly beautiful. The accommodation was perfect in every way, and we could not have asked for a better host. The host was incredibly kind, always reachable, and had a solution or assistance ready for anything we needed. This place is highly recommended for anyone looking for a serene and unforgettable escape into nature. We would love to return!

This house is a true retreat in nature, offering a perfect blend of comfort and tranquility. Surrounded by lush greenery and peaceful landscapes, it’s an ideal escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. The interior is cozy and thoughtfully designed, providing all the modern amenities while maintaining a connection to the outdoors. Whether you're looking for a quiet getaway or a base for outdoor adventures, this house in nature is a beautiful choice.

We had a fantastic time staying at Josh's place! He was an incredibly helpful host, always responded directly to our questions and provided us with great insider tips – whether it was about restaurants, bars or the most beautiful beaches. We were particularly impressed by the location: surrounded by nature, surrounded by tranquility and with an indescribable view of the sea. Just the perfect place to relax and enjoy the beauty of the surroundings.

This was one of the best places I have ever stayed, very comfortable and it felt like home. The location is perfect, up in the mountains with an incredible view, very quiet and calm yet also just a 10-15 minute walk away from shops and restaurants. Also perfect for relaxing after the crowds and heat at the Full Moon Party or Waterfall Party. The hosts were also very friendly and helpful and communication was very smooth. Highly recommended!

If you want to be close to the nature, this place is for you. 
Hidden in the forest where you can be alone. 
10min walk to the restaurants and main road where you can take easy take a taxi.
House is mostly open with separate clima bedroom with stunning view. Bathroom is nice, but the roof was leaking, so we could not have and stuff here.
We really enjoyed our stay here and we hope to back here one day.

We spent a little more than a week at the place und would have loved to stay even longer. We enjoyed the privacy on the terrace and the beautiful seaview. The kitchen and living area are open to the front but the bedroom is a closed room with lock at the door and airconditioning which was nice to sleep comfortably. Josh lives in another house right behind this one and was very helpful with everything.

Beautiful accommodation, central yet very quiet and surrounded with beautiful nature. A great place to stay even on rainy days.
We felt like at home. The communication with Josh the host was very pleasant as he is super friendly and helpful.
The view is truly phenomenal.
We would love to come back and can highly recommend the place.
Thank you very much for everything,
Sebastian & Eric

We absolutely loved this villa, it’s luxurious yet in touch with nature, and extremely comfortable. The view is phenomenal and the location is perfect, just a couple minutes scooter to shops and restaurants but still private and surrounded by nature. Everything was pristine and the decor and design is exceptional. Would definitely recommend staying here, you won’t regret it!

We had a small stay here for two and were able to enjoy it very much. Josh is a superb host. He is very friendly, helpful and very funny. The place corresponded exactly to the description and is a 10/10⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️. We wish we had booked the place a little longer as you feel right at home. We want to say thank you to Josh for everything! 100% referral

My wife and I spent three wonderful weeks in this amazing place and absolutely loved it. The photos don’t do justice to how cozy and stylish it is. The location is both convenient and private. The host is incredibly kind and helpful, always ready to assist with anything. We wholeheartedly recommend this place!

The stay was just perfect all around! The place was beautiful, very quiet with great views – great for relaxing. Everything was smooth from start to finish. The host was incredibly friendly, helpful, and professional. I felt comfortable at all times – highly recommended!

This place is absolutely amazing. We stayed for a week & enjoyed the airbnb being so open & outdoors. The view is great! The host is awesome. Always replied quickly, gave us recommendations & helped us out with a taxi upon check out. Thank you for a great stay.

A gem. Located at a reasonable height in the middle of the nature of Koh Phangan with a wonderful view of the sea. Nice and private, perfect to relax and enjoy the nature around you. Josh was also extremely friendly and helpful. Great guy! 
Highly recommended!

The Cube is in a very quiet and peaceful location. The space is very well put together. The views are stunning and the bedroom is the masterpiece here! Josh is a very helpful and friendly host. Thanks Josh, we loved it at the Cube

Very unique. Very private. Very cool. And run by a cool dude! Enjoyed my stay 100%. If you’re looking for an open living, connected to nature, amazing sea views… on a cliff vibe… while being one with nature… look no further!

Great accommodation, located in a quiet area, surrounded by nature and with sea views. Josh was super kind and provided a lot of information about the areas to visit, restaurants... highly recommended accommodation!

An enjoyable stay at the Cube!
We agree that while walking is possible for those who enjoy a mini-hike, a bike/car is the wiser option for getting the most out of your stay. 
Hope to be back one day.
It was an absolute dream - what a villa! 100000% recommend to stay and so good. Amazing communication and support too. Will gladly be back and recommend everyone the same too!
This is an amazing house, very beautiful, peaceful, nature all around. The best place on Phangan for our taste. I highly recommend it!
Amazing host. Great communication and went above and beyond
